EmailTemplate.description: Email template to inform customer that they have not scheduled a call with one of our onboarding specialists. CSP-2534
EmailTemplate.name: No Show Follow Up - Sorry I Missed You Auto
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry I Missed You! [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your Account Strategist team here at The Knot, following up. I just left a voicemail for you, I know we had planned to go over your new online storefront, but I wasn’t able to reach you.
If there is a time that works better for you, please let me know! To easily schedule the best time to chat, I’ve included a link to schedule. Please pick the date/time that works best for you, or give us a call.
Hope to talk to you soon!
